alert.note: Alert for Stutsman (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued August 01 at 7:37PM CDT until August 01 at 8:30PM CDT by NWS Bismarck
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 830 PM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN STUTSMAN COUNTY... At 736 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Courtenay, or 18 miles north of Jamestown, moving south at 15 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. At 730 PM CDT, a 77 mph wind gust was measured 5 miles west of Courtenay. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. This severe storm will be near... Spiritwood Lake around 805 PM CDT. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
